Cuq0y4iMXIggEOfiOXgzrw.text: Delicious sandwiches.  Unique, tasty, flavorful...  #20 & 35 are my favorites.  How do they make those sandwiches so crispy and perfect?   If you are downtown, do not pass this place up!  Love it!

Afh0uMbyqAtfAM3pXPb5Xw.text: Found this place using the "nearby" feature on the Yelp app and decided to give it a try. The menu is small but varied, the price is awesome ($4.50-$4.75), and the product is delicious. I got a vegetarian breakfast sandwich (#33: two poached eggs, feta cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh spinach) and my boyfriend got the Nutella, peanut butter, banana, almond sandwich. We both happily demolished them immeditately. Both Carol, the owner, and the young guy working the register were pleasant and conversational. Carol seemed to make fast friends with every customer who walked in, making sure to check on them and ask their names. One unusual thing about Zookz is the addition of a small sink at the beverage counter. This is so useful for dumping out leftover ice and liquids and rinsing plastic containers before you place them in the recycle bin next to it.   Oh, and they have punch cards! 10th sandwich is free! We will definitely be trying this place again.

X21Qfi9OUFeteLyU5OHKHA.text: Great Sunday morning breakfast!. No long wait as is typical of most places at this time . super cute atmosphere. Our order came up fast. We ha the zingger. No longer on the menu but they put a picture up because everyone likes it so much. I can see why soooo good.I was happy to see the owner out and checking food talked with us to make sure we were happy . overall pleasant experience great food and awesome customer service. Will return for more! On a side not 2 sandwiches for ten bucks can't beat that

eMlpJjQc7qgVw3RUGO5R5Q.text: Really yummy fresh ingredients. Try the potato or kale salad and you'll be delighted by the taste and textures. On our first visit, the owner came right out and talked to us about the menu and checked back in to make sure we were enjoying. It's such a cute little spot. We will absolutely be back.

hVlHm3Nwpv6KyynheNrd1Q.text: This is a great little find! I will definitely be going back. It's not real close to where I live but whenever I'm down in that area I will not pass it by. Highly recommended! Very delicious, not overpriced, very friendly.

iaCyNP3RrdjapuOEIadB0w.text: This is my first my time eating here Zookz. An Interesting and tasty twist to the typical sandwich. The potato salad was tasty too.

CrlthCfepSaGFz8ugtxdBA.text: Great tasting sandwich! First time here and had the No. 20. Only 4, not 5, stars because of the lack of parking and the small size of the sandwiches. However, this is definitely worth it and I'll be recommending this place to friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. No. 20

FNOK95MwG4QWYkTWpKssnA.text: such a cute place and great sandwiches!! I got the #15.... if you like curry or flavor you will love this. the cafe is perfectly decorated and makes you feel welcome. great for a quick lunch date or work lunch hour. prices are not bad either especially because you get your choice of a salad with it!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. yummy

8EM5nZFnMO0RB2Tj3vcSmA.text: In my opinion Zookz is over priced for "specialty sandwichs", but they so use good quality ingreide  Zookz is always very clean, and that's a big thing for me, I don't enjoy eating in a dirty establishment. No matter how busy it's been when I've been in there it's always clean.   The best thing about Zookz is the amazing woman, Bevy Jo, who manages the place. She's always so pleasant and the customers seem to really like her. The owner should be proud and happy to have such a great manager on staff! Even on a busy day, and busy lunch rush the wait is never very long and the manager always makes sure to ask if everything is enjoyable. I've never been to a busy lunchtime restaurant and had such an attentive member of management take the time to check on her customers. I would simply comeback to this establishment because of the way each customer is treated.

267x_b979iDuBm6V0Asd1A.text: Just had lunch here for the first time and OMG it was so delicious! I had the No 20 and it was so good and a kale side salad! OMG YES, I ordered and paid online and as soon as I got there my food was ready I was in and out in 3 minutes. Love it, definitely going back.

u2QVMA_3u2wqOn7WeymOKw.text: It's such a simple but brilliant idea.  I am not a sandwich person, as I never really crave the whole bread, cheese, lettuce, meat thing, but I find myself craving Zookz quite often.  Their fresh off the grill, stuffed, crustless sandwiches are amazing, and I absolutely love it!  Lots of variety, quality, and all at a reasonable price.  Would come again and again and again.

4NB5B3wMz4_x3e2pjhKSkw.text: I got the No. 20 and it was alright but the crusts of the circled sandwiches were way too over cooked and the sandwich kept falling apart. I don't feel like they have perfected they're unique sandwich yet. Not sure I would come back

OhBSVkFgratjlhO6x8oPyQ.text: The new location is great! Love the owner she is so nice and the food is always fresh and amazing. The #20 is my favorite with added egg.

9G2TMkmF9nM95n4EijIB_A.text: I had my first visit today with my co-worker and friend who suggested it after coming a while back with her husband and I am HOOKED! The ladies working behind the counter were super nice, helpful, and very welcoming. We met the owner who was the sweetest lady and I even suggested an idea for a sandwich. The ambiance of the place is relaxing and open, not stuffy at all or has that heavy food smell. The meal deal is a great price because it includes a side that is a decent portion with the main dish you order. I had the popular #20 with the kale salad as my side and the pomegranate green tea.....YASSSSS AMAZING! The style of the sandwich is so unique and it's just enough to fill you up! The bread is similar to a sourdough in the way that it is soft in the middle but has a great crunch on the outside but it doesn't cut the roof of your mouth like some breads do when they are toasted. Everything was fresh that was in the sandwich and in the salad. I will definitely be back and this place is PHENOMENAL!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Kale side salad and potato side salad with the #20.

8bPGb9mZHDtmNjLKdnHV2Q.text: The two owners are very nice-the sandwiches are fantastic.  Two types of potato salad.  The bread tastes great and it's kind of like a thin hot pocket kind of sandwich - with fresher ingredients inside!  Patio seating and nice atmosphere.

Vt8mJ2RgiFmqi5TbB-MKbA.text: Loved this place! Owner warmly greeted us and walked us through her favorites on the menu. Salad was delicious an my colleagues enjoyed the sandwiches. Highly recommend Zookz!

HT3OU44ZcxrH_iHsWh-CZg.text: Had my first taste of Zookz at breakfast this morning with long time pal.  I had number 66 he had number 11.  Our collective conclusion is we WILL return.  Very good value, very good food, light flour/bread, terrific choice of ingredients.  The pie tope crust is reminiscence of the sandwiches we made on camping boy scout outings.  Crust on both sides thin not thick. Owner Carol recently relocated to Uptown Plaza from original location just south of Camelback on Central where there was limited parking and trolley track problems. Plenty of parking at Uptown Plaza. Seating for 50 inside, another 30 outside-covered-windows open for more ambiance with misters when needed.  outside is covered. The one weakness in our opinion is the coffee, it is bitter.  Breakfast sandwiches are $5.95 plus tax.  Each is a little different. Homemade salads as well as homemade sandwiches.   Weekday hours begin at 7 AM and 8 AM Sat/Sunday

SlM_yfnWNu4eMjIo6yXoaA.text: Zookz makes outstanding, unique and affordable sandwiches and salads. Their new location in Uptown Plaza is terrific.   What separates Zookz is their care. They have a custom panini press, special-made bread, fresh ingredients and attention to detail. You won't find a traditional sandwich on their menu. The owner used to bottle salad dressings for AJs, and their kale + tangerine salad is heaven. Some restaurants have fantastic food, some restaurants have fantastic service, some restaurants have fantastic atmosphere, but finding a place that excels at all three -- and is affordable -- is rare. Love supporting local businesses where the people are just as exceptional as the food they make.  Great place for families, lunch dates, solo bites and indoor/outdoor eating in the cooler months.

dz4zpWmEncUdaTt1cLLPyQ.text: Pretty good sandwich. Not huge. Just the right size. I had the #30 and my BFF got the #20. Both good. If you have a sandwich maker at home you could probably replicate any of their sandwiches. But if you're out and about and need an inexpensive lunch stop in!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. The #30. Ham, apricot, Brie and nuts.

mqm-ErQ2osVCKL6bvi7CZg.text: Delicious, Fresh, Great Price, Fast Service!  Ordered a #3 mixed green salad online for a quick lunch one afternoon and I was pleasantly surprised at how fresh and delicious it tasted.  I was early picking up my order but they had it ready for me.  Was greeted by both the owner (I think she's the owner) and the cashier - great customer service.  My expectations for a healthy salad at lunch were not very high, but this was absolutely delicious, had chx breast, black beans, sunflower seeds, corn, and this awesome honey balsamic vinaigrette.  Even though it was simple ingredients, the fact that they were fresh and high-quality made all the difference.  Normally I don't get salads this good without paying over $10 OR making them myself.  Highly recommend this place for a delicious lunch and it's super affordable.  The sandwiches look amazing....brie and ham for less than $7??!

j7MB-K3pkCd1TDxqxkOUxQ.text: These sandwiches are amazing. Will definitely return. Little bummed they forgot my salad in my Togo bag but sandwich was great nonetheless.

4G40vEjaHODtBVq-joZ6yQ.text: Great concept, round sandwich shop. It also has other healthy options like Kale salads.  Great little spot for a quick bite. The breakfast sandwiches are my favorite with simple fresh ingredients. Nice service and clean. Nothing fancy but quaint place to eat.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Roast beef sandwich

RBgaQedAkrixrIekDLrFlQ.text: They now have a location on Washington & 1st Street in downtown PHX.  Close to the office so I checked out the #26 for $9.  They put potatoes in this sandwich which ruined the taste of the other ingredients.  When potatoes or rice are added to something like this, I perceive it as "filler" food...food that is cheaper and fills up the entre.  It would have been ALOT better without them.  A pricey little sandwich.  Probably won't visit it again but it might work for others.

O5R61ajPOuoX-IMLtzT0Mg.text: I really enjoy coming here for a breakfast sandwich and on Sunday they have mimosas. The people are friendly atmosphere casual. I am a fan and will definitely continue to return.

AOAQ1ZTKCuu4kZDoJzzoiA.text: I travel to this area periodically on business. I always include a stop at Zookz for a sandwich. I have ordered several of the lunch sandwiches and all of them have been very good. Additionally, the staff are very friendly and the service is super fast. Although one sandwich is plenty for me, a larger eater would not be filled up with just one. My teenage son who plays football would need about four of them :-)

sEfR6Jqcg9MVKJvwgftDlw.text: I can eat this everyday.   The owner Carol is super sweet and you can tell shes following her passion of making people full and happy.  The turkey cranberry is amazing even though it may sound bad. The eggs in the breakfast sandwhich are cooked to perfection.  You actually cant go wrong here.

KRtDSHtsxO5HKHyWw0t_Fg.text: Came here for breakfast today, and it was a great experience. Ordered a number 33 with a cake. Really good food. Came out fast, and the decor is really cute and modern. Excited to come back and try other sandwiches !   Only thing I would say is maybe have Tabasco as a condiment to accompany Siracha. I like adding a lot hot sauce lol

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

fUtzFGBRSNDREcPHhvSqOw.text: Today I took my two teenagers into Zookz and we had not been there before.  We were greeted by Carol, the owner and she was so so so nice and sweet and helpful.  She provided stellar customer service and made us feel welcome. She gave a few recommendations and explained that they serve the breakfast sandwiches all day. We ordered two of the turkey bacon avocado sandwiches and one of the roast beef.  This is going to be our new fave place.  The food hit the spot and tasted amazing.  The potato salad is to die for and they even have a few different flavors of fresh brewed tea to choose from. Our favorite tea was the peach flavor.  We also tasted the Nutella banana and peanut butter dessert and it was so good! I will definitely be back.  Next time I will go for breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Turkey bacon avocado and potato salad.
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Turkey avocado with a side of chips.
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Roast beef sandwich and potato salad

OdOkQLYG9R1zVwBdH8Ehcg.text: Recommended by a woman I met, we went the same day for lunch. It was pricey but the sandwiches are freshly made and there isn't anything like it. I did #35 roast beef and enjoyed it immensely. The potato salad on the side was different but good as well. This is not your average sandwich place, and definitely worth a try.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Potato salad

sxpi6nllzSMAIfHaPaMYOg.text: This is the best breakfast sandwich I've tasted anywhere! I've come two days in a row. My favorite is the No. 22. It's flavorful, warm and very filling. I can't wait to try the lunch ones!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. No. 22! Yum!

PBEc8oThb6Vn03dRMr0-Pg.text: I was in the area and saw many great reviews of this place on yelp so I decided to try a breakfast sandwich..#66 its a popular one and I thought it was very delicious! I just think they're way too small, I saw a review that said it was big and filling and I personally thought it wasn't because its way too small. I felt good with what I ate but they're small for the price. The lunch sandwiches are like almost $9 and honestly not worth the price. If anything a breakfast sandwich is worth it because its cheaper.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Very good. #66 they&#39;re smaller than they look though. Very small sandwich.

MgBSTm9ZDTWyNfWR7FJ5Hg.text: Wow, so I live in the west valley, and I sometimes have appointments or errands in this area. I was looking for a light lunch to have with my family, and found this near my location with high reviews. I checked it out and good god I was impressed. The owner had AMAZING customer service, she went over the menu, and all the best sellers with us, and even suggested what the kids would like and how they would like it. At first, I thought to myself "I might have to get two sandwiches because they seem small and I'm really hungry". Well, I'll admit I was wrong. I ordered a lunch sandwich that comes with a side salad (potato salad with black beans). It was all great.       I had to have a bite of everyone's sandwiches at the table, and every single one was great. I had a #10, with turkey, Parmesan, apples, walnuts, cranberries and their sweet heat sauce, and I might have to make that my usual. But I want to try the rest of their menu as well. DEFINITELY a lunch spot I'll be returning to over and over any time I'm in the area!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

XWIpIig6p2Cqo3ysVjvgNQ.text: This was our first time here because we're from LA. The owner greeted us and helped us pick our breakfast. We got No 11 and No 66 and substituted for egg whites. Both so good! Definitely recommend. Overall, great experience.

lfGTU23jY7PMkynSBL7Igg.text: I have seen the reviews and i bookmarked this place right away. Walking in we were greeted by none other than the owner. She approached us and knew from our faces this was our first time. She was super friendly and super informative on the concept of the place. She gave us suggestions on what to get. I ordered #35 which was a roast beed sandwich with the potato salad that was included. My mother got #25 which was a turkey sandwich with the garbanzo beans side salad.  Honestly they were both amazing. The pricing is reasonable.  I wish i lived in Arizona to get the chance to try this place again before heading back to California.  Im gonna try to visit this place agin before i leave.  I can truly say we don't have something like this in socal. Love the food and flavor and love the service as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Amazing #35

9aIQelhAkDPbe48vUvajLA.text: WHOA - I did not expect that much deliciousness from a simple breakfast sandwich! the staff was patient & kind despite the place being packed for lunch. I couldn't decide between two, but the sweet cashier gave a recommendation that I was THRILLED with! The #66 has to be one of the best brekky sandwiches ever! skip the boring bagel, and try this unique little sandwich pocket!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. the #66 aerial view :P these are like gourmet uncrustables! I can&#39;t even!

NjgciS-CXEw_gfR5z8Ey1w.text: After a stressful morning I came here with my best friend for the very first time. It was lunch time but I ordered breakfast  Ordered number #33 and it was bomb dot com!!! It was like a food gasm in my mouth. Oh and the prizes for the sandwiches was super reasonable. It's like $5-6 per sandwich.   Oh and I also walked in on a girl using the restroom so I think you guys need to fix the bathroom lock. Haha.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Number #33

0yzm4xKAyZ_WAUq27hhULA.text: Just can't hardly decide which to eat.  They are all delish. Wish they stayed open a little longer.

esdWWLVK7O6o4n_auqf6_w.text: These sandwiches are small but filling! They are so incredibly good, a panini mixed with an uncrustable from Smuckers.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

o63zWj5kM_My1jcZJ-u0Cg.text: Was in the area and thought I'd stop in for a quick bite to eat.  Located off Camelback Road but can be a little difficult to miss unless you're in the actual compound, then the sign becomes visible. Lots of parking.  The place is on the small side (-1).  There is outside seating, tough in my opinion, not enough.  High chairs and tables are available indoors, but still I couldn't help but feeling quite choked whilst in there. Staff were great and friendly.  Answered any questions we had and even made recommendations.  Menu was easy to comprehend.  Restaurant has an open concept so I'm not sure how customers would be cooled during the hot summer months.  Restaurant was clean.  Food was delicious.  The rounded toasted sandwich concept is interesting and innovative.  Everything is made fresh.  I had the pulled pork (I believe #60) and that comes with a side. I chose their potato salad.  The latter was fresh, tasty, and a small kick to it.  The sandwich tasted fresh and flavorful. If I'm in the area again, I'd definitely like to try some of the other choices on the menu, but will probably take it away or eat in my car.

ZI4TThVJXqNDu5Qks2fAbA.text: I really like this place! For someone who doesnt really like sandwhiches i love it! Its very cute and i love the decor and seating area. I got the #11 which has bacon, cheese, tomato, cream cheese, and egg. I knew the sandwhich was going to be rich tasting right off the bat because of the cream cheese. To be honest i wasnt expecting a lot of bacon, because lets be real here, what place actually puts a lot of bacon in anything? To my surprise it was filled with chopped bacon. 4/5! Also to add the ladies at the front were extremely nice!  And of course the REAL reason i came here was because of the #55. Nutella, banana, peanut butter and roasted almond goodness! Ugh. Im a sucker for anything chocolate and peanut butter. Oh my gosh this sounded like heaven and it was!!! 5/5 This is the only reason for my 5 star review. I didnt know such thing even exsisted on earth. This will def be bad for my wallet and ill pay for it at the gym.. damn

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Seriously? This just looks like gooey heaven..
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. #11

5sfoQEx4SLgcDtT_DWJyfw.text: This was a cool little place on Camelback. The sandwiches are SO crispy on the outside, and the inside is filled to the brim. First time coming here and it was definitely a hit. I want to come back to try the breakfast sandwiches.   I ended up choosing the No 26 and it was soooo good. The ham was heated well, the potato and the cheese tasted so good together. I don't know what to say. It was such a good little place to eat lunch.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

ix1IxE1h8a1iUBpzlqJhyA.text: LOVE this place, I typically order through Uber Eats at work and they're always expeditious. I have been to the uptown location a couple of times with coworkers - it's very unique and trendy. The sandwiches are amazingly delicious and shaped like a spaceship, IMO. I adore that they have gluten free bread and that's why they're hands down my favorite sandwich shop in Phoenix. Sandwiches come with a side - your choice of a kale/mandarin salad, which is delicious, a rather unusual but tasty potato salad that has black beans in it, or a bag of Tim's chips. I have tried all their lunch sandwiches with the exception of the 2 vegetarian choices, and all are really good. My guilty pleasure here is #35 with roast beef, bacon, tomatoes, potatoes and horseradish sauce - wowza! I have not yet tried their breakfast sandwiches but a coworker has tried most of them and gives them two thumbs up so I will have to try one soon.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Waiting for my sammich

ky8Os2m2dqk8Ons002JhWA.text: Hands down one of THE best sandwiches of my life. The concept of a round sandwich destroyed my ego, ahah.   I ordered one that came with scalloped potatoes, beans, cheese and avocado. God lord. I was only supposed to eat half, and save the other half for later (because I didn't want to be too full).   I definitely have my jeans unbuttoned as I type this review.   This was a serious sandwich and I'm ready to return.  Keep up the fireeeee.

J7vD3DY7w4_eiR81EyU9BA.text: I hosed myself with hype from the internet articles and Yelp so a 3.5 stars rounded up to 4 stars for charm and good service. I had a 66 breakfast sandwich  and the flagship lunch #20.   The 66 was by far my favorite. Poached eggs and gooey cheese and sauce lends itself to a pressed sandwich. The 20 was not a bad sandwich. The side kale salad was lovely. Fresh brewed iced tea and clean and fun atmosphere.   If you are super hungry you will need two sandwiches. If you dislike white bread you will not like this tasted road white bread sandwich.

IXJBa-BPERlQrAh8P71RZg.text: Great customer service and love that they have gluten free options.    I find the the amount of filling to be too little for the sandwich, making it a lot of bread for the price.  I usually leave still hungry.  I do like that they have a kale salad as a side option--its ok.   I don't consider this place to be eco-friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. No 22
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. No 20 added spinach on gluten free bread

gx25w3uIgAPfS2OgFL73mg.text: Really enjoyed this place as a recommendation from our son who attends GCU.  Met the owner on Sunday. Sweet lady and passionate about the restaurant. Sandwiches were excellent. The tomato basil was the BEAST! Will be back.

-Y5tyPIaQhdhhWWGSlCAfA.text: Wow!  Crazy good and unlike anything you've ever had.  It all starts with a "contraption" that encloses bread filled with poached eggs, cheese, green onions and just about anything else you can imagine and it is toasted to perfection. Creamy, crunchy, sweet, savory all in an open air environment with a great staff. Go!

3O9E1RL11dLTDK6XvIJawQ.text: First experience here- have only heard good things! Tried the #22- breakfast sandwich with egg, bacon, black bean, avocado and chipotle sauce.. pretty good with Franks Red Hot but would likely order without beans the next time. The sandwiches are fairly small, so if you don't get a side (free with all lunch sandwiches), you may be left a little hungry. Momma ordered the lunch sandwich with chicken and avocado, and it was really yummy. Would like to try their desserts next time around.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Potato salad side
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. #No. 22 Sandwich
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Outside of #No. 22 Sandwich

eA9H5QNSfeOn0J65lNeQJg.text: Saw it the day before on 3TV. If Scott Pasmore eats something with vegetables on it you better go try it. 3TV claimed this was the best breakfast sandwich in Phoenix. I still have more to try but this is on top of my list currently! Went with the number 44: two egg frittata, bacon, ham ,feta cheese, parmesan, roasted red peppers & fresh basil.  This was stupid delicious. I could tell from what I saw on TV the crust was going to be the best part but it is so much better than your eyes let you see. I have so many things I want stuffed in it. Every bite, crust, eggy goodness and bacon explosions.   Split the number 20: Thinly sliced turkey, bacon, fresh avocado,tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese zookz sweet heat mustard sauce.   This was out of this world! even with the sauce. But don't get me wrong I like the sauce. I just wasn't expecting it cuz I didn't know it was on it. My friend ordered this. I knew what to expect with mine but not with this. The sauce is sweet and it works but I feel like it could have worked without it. Me personally I'd swap it out with the chipotle sauce and be okay. But it was bananas how good it was.   I got the Mimosa sandwich combo amazing deal. $10. The passion fruit Mimosa was so damn good. I don't even drink often but I chugged this down like I was going day drinking. I wasn't.   Now we didn't get our side salad and both agreed we were still a little hungry. I think if we'd gotten the side salad with the second sandwich we wouldn't have been. What I would love is if they had something with the breakfast items like the side salad with the lunch. We weren't sure if it was cause we got drinks instead of, or of it was forgotten but it was all good.   I would pay good money for cheesy hashbrowns. shredded potatoes stuffed with cheese toasted in that amazing toaster. Steal my idea.   Overall amazing value great food will be back want to know how much they'll let you customize. Sorry bout the teeth marks in the pics I had to eat it right away.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Number 44: two egg frittata bacon ham feta cheese parmesan roasted red peppers fresh basil. I had to buy it right away.
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Number 20 Finley size turkey bacon fresh avocado tomatoes shredded cheddar cheese zookz sweet hot mustard sauce

GqXUA1gqnoyUyBOX0n3F4Q.text: Omg yum. I've been wanting to come here foreva and I was in the area today so I stopped in after 3 pm. So glad they were open until 4 pm, since their Cityscape location isn't open on Saturdays. Found a parking spot right in front and walked in. Love that it opens up to outdoor seating, with a couple of tables inside as well.   I decided to order the #10, which is turkey, Parmesan cheese, almonds, cranberries, apples, and sweet heat mustard sauce. It came with a side salad and I got their potato salad, which includes corn, green onions, and black beans. My gosh that was surprisingly delicious. The sandwich was fun, it's packed with flavor and as someone else has called it, it's basically an adult uncrustable. I'm a fan of crust but this totally works. I'd like to try their breakfast sandwiches one day and their peanut butter dessert option.   Service was quick and friendly, and be sure to check in for 10% off.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. #10 with potato salad

i27xgbWfZjMaXRCRSR0q0g.text: Yelp does it again. This place makes your sandwich in one of those sandwich presses that seals the outside edges.   I ordered a number 35, roast beef, bacon, cheddar cheese (I ordered it without), tomatoes, sliced potatoes (I ordered it without) and horseradish sauce.  Delish.  Comes with a side of potato salad that is really good.  Yummy.  Brian took me at the checkout. What a great guy. Very cheerful.

g-fIy404XBdodwjNmOPY8Q.text: We had been wanting to go here for a while but live about forty minutes away and barely ever go out to lunch, but yesterday was the day to try this amazing place. I ordered the #10. It had poached eggs, cheddar, bacon, basil and cream cheese. I'm not sure what exactly is in the bread they use, but it is delicious. The sandwich reminded me of a gourmet, over the top with deliciousness hot pocket. I have never had anything quite like it. The service was fast and friendly. I liked that the restaurant is able to open up their windows and doors to give it a cool indoor/outdoor feeling. If you are in the area of one of these or at the airport I highly reckoned Zookz.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. #10

dre4JgmrMKmfFfSGjA9FRw.text: What is better than a sandwich? I mean really, the options and combinations are endless. Zookz offered sandwiches which are different from just about any sandwich shop I have been to! This place is those weird uncrustable sandwiches meets a toasty, cheesy, delicious stuffed sandwich that you actually WANT to eat. The one I ordered had turkey, bacon, tomato, cheese, a honey mustard sauce and avocado. The flavors all melded really well together. I will say if you are super hungry, this sandwich may not cut it for you as they are on the smaller side. However I think this place is perfect for when you want a small bite and want to make sure that small bite has big flavor. Per usual, parking situation is important to me. This location is located in the uptown plaza which has plenty of parking that is free.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

rFcJ2Y0sg6oP_VoYAmSuiA.text: Really great sandwich spot. South by with a few friends a few days ago and I have to tell you that the sandwiches here are out of this world. Didn't really have to wait very long the people working the counter were very nice polite and accommodating.   My friends ordered roast beef and I got a nice hot pocket and I have to tell you this place is definitely the place to go if you want a really great And quick meal . It's clean the people are nice the food is great so what more can you ask for?

VApBab3PsjLwHW0WzDmsDA.text: The sandwiches here are the middle ground between a traditional grilled sandwich and an empanada - delicious! The kale side salad was also well dressed and very flavorful.

GzM8hTU3qsHt_eQXOW5KTg.text: Love this place. Super relaxed atmosphere, very chill place to grab a leisurely Saturday/Sunday morning coffee and a primo delicious, filling, yet light breakfast. Sometimes you're simply just not in the mood to deal with the whole ordeal that is a sit down brunch. Waiting, hoping for an open table, waiting for a server and hoping they're not too busy to actually provide decent service, and just the overall sit down dining experience. Zookz is casual, order/pay ahead, get your meal promptly brought out to you while you do the fixings on your coffee (they also have mimosas for those looking to help a hangover), no stress weekend breakfast. Perfect if it's a particular day in which you need to get things done and can't afford to spend 1-3 hours boozing over eggs and pancakes. Good service, friendly, menu is creative to satisfy most. Price is super fair. My definite go to for quick, yet relaxing, breakfast without having to compromise on taste/quality/feeling crappy from fastfood.

GOJhaXe9btlKl7Ce0V_rMA.text: Wow, wow, WOW!!! Was not expecting the amazing perfection that just entered my mouth! Our son recommended Zookz to us, so happy he did! They are without doubt the most unique, crunchy, delightful sandwich I've ever had! We came for Breakfast, and can't wait to try their lunch sandwiches! (Our sons favorite.) The cappuccino was on point as well! A perfect, quick breakfast that left us beyond satisfied! All without breaking the bank! Great value, amazing sandwich!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

GoOOAvWSu-u5GEOc-F6EJg.text: FOOD: the sandwich was pretty yummy. It is pretty small though and not as filling as expected. My friend and I were both still hungry after we were done with our sandwiches. But they both had great flavor and are different from most sandwiches out there.   SERVICE: minimal interaction due to the fact that you go up and order and they bring the food out to you. If you get a side salad you have to pick it from the fridge which is a little odd.   Atmosphere: it is veryyyyyy tiny in here. Definitely a place to grab a quick sandwich. Doesn't seem ideal for a long lunch or breakfast date. The bathroom doesn't have a changing table which is supppper frustrating. I had to go change my baby in my car. Places should always have a changing table.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. 22 and kale side salad
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. 22

aH7lZ2OJ61v-5qA78SFWdQ.text: Finally trying out this place based on the reviews & it lived up to the hype! The restaurant itself is very quaint and well decorated. The customer service was great very friendly & welcoming staff. The sandwich was delicious I got the No 25 and the contents inside were filled as much as they could have been (Also, huuuuge fan of the sweet chipotle sauce). It's like a glorified grilled cheese with happiness inside! Also the side was a good addition I got the garbanzo bean one & the lemon zest gave it a good flavor.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

00praWCfBO3QQKn-sXnISg.text: I've seen the ads. I've read the reviews. And the fact is, people are selling Zookz - and selling it hard! Maybe too hard, in fact.    Not that I think Zookz is bad. I like them for an occasional lunch option. But when I read some of these reviews, one would think that I'm eating some revolutionary sandwich that is going to grant me immortality and make me immune from ever being summoned for jury duty.   If you're the type that enjoys your sandwiches jam-packed with a hodgepodge of ingredients, then fully expect great things. Throw on a little hot sauce if you feel your choice is lacking in flavor. But honestly, I really see these sandwiches as just a boatload of stuff all jam packed into toasted bread. Nothing inside the sandwiches particularly pops out as memorable - meaning that they all taste very similar.  The bread has always kind of baffled me. The edges are hard and chewy, while the majority of it is nice and crispy. I'd call it a cross between an empanada and a pot pie. But for some reason, I keep wanting more flavor from it, almost like the crust from a pasty or a torta bun. But it's just not there.   For six to eight dollars, I guess it works for what it is. But let's face it, a five-star Pane Bianco sandwich this most definitely is not. But based on all their five star reviews, what the hell do I know?  If you're seeking something quick, cheap, and edible, then Zookz is definitely worth trying. And when I look at their setup and approach, Zookz is the kind of place that I can easily see becoming a chain in the not so distant future.  Check them out.

I3HnC0tkHO47jIgX1g_KZQ.text: One of my favorite restaurants in Phoenix! Delicious sandwiches, great ambience, and super friendly people, what's there not to like? My personal favorite is the #20 and the kale salad.

Jn3Z3vr-9t_HIT9F9mamCw.text: I have been meaning to come here for a long time.  Now that they are at their new location,  I finally made it in. It was delicious!!!! I had the number 40 lunch sandwich. Whoa, was it flavorful. My friend and I both had the garbanzo bean side salad, and I think it was the owner, brought us an extra kale to make sure we tasted it. She also made sure to come back by to ensure we enjoyed everything.  I will definitely be back and highly recommend :)

_sudqq-nYNSh0bryR23O2A.text: Just tried this place out for the first time and will definitely be going back.  Cute place inside with nice interior.  Very open feel to it and you can sit on bar stools, look out at Camelback Road while you eat. We ordered the #11 and #66 which were both delicious.  Coffee was strong and hot!  Nice little breakfast spot!

Br3HKAoD1ItG7BBJbmMfcQ.text: Seriously don't even remember the name of the sandwich but I am much better with numbers, it was a number 44 and fell from heaven into Zooks.  These sandwiches are tasty!  We stopped in on the way to the National Championship (Clemson v. Alabama).  Stacey waited on us and was super sweet.  After our meal, she surprised us with some sort of Nutella marries peanut butter concoction.  What!  Delicious.  The owner Carol also stopped by and shared some of the story of how she started, super sweet woman.  This business will turn into a franchise down the road, just wait.  Until then, I'll stop by when I am in Phoenix.

mx4q2XT0Wmh1Rgynu31UAA.text: Fresh, quick and delicious... And the new location has an inviting open atmosphere too!  Try the new #60 - awesome!

wLOcQkfna5zMMoQRRun4QQ.text: Came here for the first time this past weekend and will certainly return.  Great service, unique sandwiches from a a bread standpoint and my roast beef and cheddar was very tasty and had just enough horseradish sauce!

8UF7sNCavy2IuCqsOA4D3A.text: Heaven. I love it when a place offers breakfast all day. Not that I got the breakfast, but just thought I'd mention that nice perk. First of all, the employees are all so helpful, kind and accommodating; and they were eager to please. These sandwiches are absolutely delicious. They are all pretty unique in one way or another, but my husband and I split two different sandwiches and were equally thrilled with both. Their crust is enough by itself to make any sandwich taste good.  For those of you with a picky palate, they are willing to make a sandwich however you please, so don't fret when you don't see anything on the menu that sounds good. Also tried the kale salad and potato salad. Both were absolutely delicious and unique!  All in all, my tummy was extremely happy when we left and I will definitely be back.

GwBBn1V3baDLyzW6tt_L_A.text: The best sandwiches ever. The ambience, the story and the love are personified through every item on the menu. Thank you Carol and Berdjoui!

7zkPxwtzS6jpq9Klr8Rr9A.text: New place and I must say... WOW  New start up businesses take notes, this is how you get happy customers. Staff is friendly and understands the products. Neat atmosphere, Great food with a Unique touch and very fair prices.   Has a very new age urban feel, yet still professional.

d8DBrfGUX4CFHB2haIYYSg.text: One of my favorite sandwhich places. Much better than others in the area. I got the #20 and it was delish.

tB7APOYLfuIfI0Q1REo3eg.text: My husband found this place while golfing with a buddy. He raved about it all week long and then insisted we go back the following Saturday morning. I tried the No. 11 with avocado and it was so good, my son even likes this place and he's a finicky eater. The owner Carol came out introduced herself and asked if we needed anything. Overall I would definitely venture Back to central Phoenix for another Zooks No. 11.. The service was quick and great, the staff is friendly, the food is really good!!!

7_G75hgdScdvY55e8KF71w.text: Even though we had were already kind of full, we had to hit up Zookz. Love all the food, great service, awesome place!! Thank you Carol, Bevy Jo, and the rest of the crew!!

OAiuzv4ge9bDBLekFXE9_A.text: These sandwiches are nothing short of spectacular. Fresh, flavorful ingredients in a unique, easy to eat sandwich. You must first get over the shock of just how beautiful the cross section of these are but once you do I assure you it will be one of the greatest sandwich experiences of your life. The options and combinations let you make any sandwich you can imagine but I went with a simple regular menu item and I was not disappointed. On top of it all the restaurant itself is lovely to be in, open to the outdoors with water misters and greenery make it very comfortable and pleasant to wait for your to go order or dine in with some friends. Great place all around and I will be spreading the word and taking everyone I know.

m68eeCSyiQVbzNCBfCPRWg.text: Such a delightful, fabulous find. So refreshing to find a delicious, hands on (the owner is there everyday), perfectly priced breakfast and lunch joint.  I can't say enough about how unusually scrumptious these pressed sandwiches are with their unique fillings, both for breakfast and lunch. And, I'm so glad the restaurant as moved into a new location around the corner with MORE parking.  The sides are amazing as well (your choice comes with each lunch. The ymmy kale salad has already been positively hailed in the other reviews). Do your taste buds a favor and give Zooks a try-I guarantee you won't be disappointed!

E13-Fr1NeKtA_Mo7U1wfiQ.text: Went there today to check the place out. Was highly rated on the Yelp site...THE FOOD IS AWESOME and the price is VERY REASONABLE. The owner takes pride in her menu and came over to talk to us for about 5-10 minutes. We both started our with their patented pressed turkey sandwiches, which come with a small side salad. Both the sandwiches and side salads were FANTASTIC. How good?  I picked up two full side salads "To Go". Yes, we were impressed and Yes, we will be returning soon. By the way, the Prickly Pear Tea was delicious...

m_2RbMMu10IYIC8Vg3JWLQ.text: I really enjoy eating lunch here....so much, I've come here 2 days in a row and I don't ever do that!    The portions are perfect...you'll be pleasantly full.  But more than that....your taste buds will thank you!  Everything I've had here was uniquely different and delicious!!!

K9jDud-1Q3_bRQA9duKQ8A.text: Best sandwiches in AZ so far. We ordered #20 and #11. So good! Everyhing tastes fresh and they have good coffee too. Great ambiance, friendly staff. I will keep coming here.

npKXxuq7kvpzRy5O1TVDLg.text: Tasty sandwiches and an extremely friendly owner. The last time I was in, she noticed I hadn't eaten my salad and offered me my choice of another salad or chips. Wonderful customer service, great food and very reasonably priced.

tbL8NKnm09yNXri6m3fmGA.text: Always tasty, always nice staff and always satisfying. The husband always craves to come here. It hits the spot when you are look for fast-casual, freshly made food.

yg4OtZtnhf5klaqefX6uow.text: Our family loves Zookz. We've eaten here countless times. The sandwiches are good. The side items are good and the desserts are good. But the friendly, lovely owner makes this place so great to visit. She is ALWAYS so kind to my entire family. She has given us free sides when they've just been introduced to get our feedback, or a surprise treat for my children. Just a really special lady that cares about the people she serves and the food she puts out. Great combo. The people know your name and your order because they care and pay attention when you walk in.

WjWf8MUnx3Tq5t1iQdw2KQ.text: Great sandwiches and EXCELLENT customer service! My husband and I place pick-up orders often, and today there was a mistake on my sandwich. I called to let them know and Carol offered, practically insisted, to drop off a new sandwich for me without even knowing where we live!!  That's what I call amazing customer service- thank you!!! We're happy that your kindness will keep us coming back because we love your food!!  If you haven't been to Zookz, support local and eat delicious food from caring people! ** The above portion was written for Zookz Facebook page. I've decided to add it to Yelp, too!  Again, the food here is delicious- every sandwich is amazing!  Don't forget to get the kale salad on the side- I could drink the dressing.  Carol and her staff simply know how to treat customers- they are the best!

4n-Dc9SofIrEoD0gC87tRg.text: Very tasty and good value. Works well for staff lunches and the sandwiches have sealed ends and are great car food.

M9HRd2bA013m7royiYVNIg.text: Amazing. Another local Phoenix gem.  I'll try my best to use words to describe why these sandwiches are brilliant. They are pocket sandwiches cooked up superbly. The fillings are sliced delicately thin and diced just right. The fillings are tenderly nestled between two circular pieces of bread, and the whole thing is cooked so that the bread is toasty brown and the fillings are warm and juicy. The whole thing adds up to a party in your mouth. It's almost like a gourmet grilled cheese, but way more amaze-balls.  I had the #20, turkey, bacon, avocado with some amazing magical sauce in it. You get a small salad with any sandwich. I had the kale, nut, mandarin orange salad. As if the sandwich wasn't amazing enough, the salad put me over the edge.  On my second visit, I had the roast beef cheddar bacon (#35). Yum yum yum yum yum.  The service is great and the place is very cute.  I highly recommend Zookz for lunch.

ZWMHaPXvqwLdvJ63DDO91A.text: I picked up. Easy to order over the phone and the food was ready when I got there.   I got #25 it was ok. Not the best sandwich I have ever had. But I am willing to try a different one and see if I change my mind. My side was a potato salad that was good.

M6V15nsmLco1dQFoPB9kEA.text: Wow the food here is on point, I love the space ship looking toasted sandwich. Not to crispy and not to soft, perfect blend. Fast, simple and very enjoyable. M To bad I didn't check in on Yelp to get 10% off. I want to come back again. 5 Stars all the way!

2Z5Q61xqtc-IvzcYVmLhzA.text: Sandwiches are good, just not what is was hoping for. Small sandwich for the price. Very trendy area if that's important to you. Would I go back no, I'm use to a man size sandwich.

1GsXclxK-mbLOsaToJv9gQ.text: Had the opportunity to visit Zookz twice over this past weekend.  The menu was amazing with both traditional and nouveau flavor combinations that were absolutely delicious.  Two of my favorites were the pulled pork sandwich with zookz cole slaw and sauce, and the poached egg sandwich with bacon spinach and zookz cream cheese sauce.    The owner was charming and treated us just like family.  A must go!

HkW4tY_gumgfxx47eTwDIg.text: I ate there 2 weeks ago when I was in town for a diamondbacks game and I have been dreaming of these sandwiches. Come on, its just a panini on round bread, ahh, no, its so much more, that sauce, there has to be something in it. Sweet mustard. Idk but I seriously cant stop craving it. Worth the 2 hour drive, but not quite worth the drive back to Tucson. So so good, hope they expand.

labNPo6aQPIbTmNbDaxZ0A.text: We first tried this place a long time ago at their old location off Central. I still love Zookz and their new location is not far from their old location. It's the perfect little spot for a light/healthy lunch or breakfast! My favorite sandwich is the No. 25. The side kale salad is amazing too!

-RkCOhI91laZPAHTzntFZg.text: I've been here twice now, and while not bad, I find nothing really satisfying about the place. First visit, my breakfast sandwich fillings were distributed mostly to one side, so one half was relatively tasty but the other side was bland. 2nd visit, my lunch sandwich fillings were good, but nothing really stood out that would make want the sandwich again, or even to return to Zookz at all. My biggest complaint about Zookz is the bread. Their 'uncrustable' style of sandwich pocket pressing results in a very dry, very hard, unappealing, nearly inedible 1" surround on the sealed edge of the bread. If they buttered the bread before closing it up in their clamshell press, it might improve the product.   Zookz isn't bad; it just fell far short of my expectations based on reviews. Two visits & I'll opt for the many other better sandwich places around town from now on.

423_Ci3gqVCp-6u_dS_0jg.text: What a wonderful find!  Super friendly service that you just don't find anymore. The sandwiches are amazing. Great value for family. We will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

XmSDxnrBgQS8GRbhyvtt7g.text: This place was AWESOME! Think of those uncrustable pb & j sandwiches but AMAZING and filled with all sorts of things-like turkey, avocado, etc. all in warm bread! This place is a huge hit and I can't wait to go back.

htKi45T3U08n8FoHgTmLwg.text: Convenient parking, fresh and delicious food, great menu, friendly and helpful staff. I especially enjoyed the outside seating. I understand the necessity of packaging the kale salad in a plastic container, but I am all about waste reduction. I cannot remember if they recycle, but if they do it would make for a better dining experience for me.   I will definitely be back!

6oVwYqDHe6_ijte3KkGDFA.text: Average at best. Not sure why the rating is so hi. It's a hot pocket and the portion size Is small. Not satisfying

7QHIRby38EMJ17mKsfL0JQ.text: My coworker sent me over there for lunch. And may I say those sandwiches are delicious, just a bit small for my taste though. You might need two or more make you full. The interior of the restaurant is absolutely gorgeous and I love the seating. They even have misters outside! Great for this AZ heat. And there is outside seating for people with dogs.

qO3CwopbWE7ay8WybIeNFA.text: Ok, so I want to love this place, I've been waiting to try it for months, but in my opinion it's really just ok. I can only speak for my experience and for the two items that I ordered. I came in at noon on a Tuesday and ordered the mozz/spinach sandwich with a side of kale salad and a drink. While I waited for my sandwich, I stood by the fountain drinks waiting for the repair man to get down from his ladder blocking the faucets...he didn't. I stood there for 10 mins waiting for him to move until I finally asked the cashier if I would be able to get a drink. Ok, forgiven. The extremely hard crust on what is deemed to be a crustless sandwich was inexcusable. The contents of the sandwich were good, but only after peeling off the edges was I able to enjoy it. The kale salad was sub-par. Maybe I came on an off day, or maybe I just ordered the wrong thing.  Overall, worth a shot but don't build it up before you go. It's nothing to write home about.

qjf0Cm7m-6CjCshLPblwxg.text: Great prices, great food. Zooks is my go-to spot when I'm hungry and in a hurry in Phoenix around lunchtime. The #20 (for turkey lovers) & #35 (for roast beef type people) are my favorites! I always get the kale salad on the side. Service is very friendly!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. #35. SO GOOD. Order it.

YWyxNYglWkWgjI0h4bvgzA.text: Very, very over rated!  The only thing that stands out is the service.  If you are the person that raves about a market sandwich from Pane Bianco this is not for you.  Very simple and very average ingredients. My mom has been making sandwiches like this for me my entire life. I think I was expecting similar flair like the sandwiches from Culinary Dropout.   Food Guy Out!

-lUjh4i_fD7nyefw_uiYIg.text: I wanted to give Zooks 5 stars but it falls a tiny bit short. The flavors are amazing and unique. There's definitely nothing like this anywhere! The Kale salad and it's house-made dressing are phenomenal!! :) BUT! Two-bites and it's gone. The portions are way too small. Not a good idea when your boyfriend refuses to go because he needs at least 3 sandwiches to feel satisfied. If you do the math, that's about $18-20, with no drink. Hopefully Zooks will add a "Big Boy" size one day soon.

cgs590_a4ho9K3SWwiI2sw.text: It was about damn time when I finally went out and tried this sammich shop. Zookz takes a delicious new look at the classic panini, and I couldn't be happier to report that they're friggin' tasty!   I had a No 25 filled with ham, fresh tomatoes and avocados, seasoned black beans, shredded cheddar cheese, and housemade chipotle sauce. Already the sammich sounded delicious, but I was given the advice, which I kindly accepted, to add bacon. Everything is apparently better with bacon, and this sandwich was no exception to that rule. With my sandwich I had a side of Zookz's potato salad that was also tasty, and definitely fresh!  Friendly staff mixed with delicious and inventive cooking make Zookz a hit in my book, especially for lunch. The only negative I could possibly have is the serving size. If you're a hungry person, they're sandwiches may need to settle a bit before they'll fill you up. That said, don't let that stop you from dropping in! I personally can't wait to go for breakfast!

vqkjOhECTA6nnrszAFJJKg.text: The hype is 100% warranted. This place is great. If you're boring and basic and want a plain sandwich, go to Subway. If you want your mind blown by an incredible sandwich like no other, go to Zookz.

R01uWej0yHRohXHl6qz05g.text: My husband and I wanted to try something new. We were treated so so nice and I LOVED the food. You have to try it! I had the 15 but with chipotle. I have definitely put Zookz on my FAVE LIST!!! Keep up the good work Zookz. Glad you are in the neighborhood

YTFzKRYIyR2QTwKmREdoMQ.text: First time goers.  Three of us really enjoyed the unique sandwiches there yesterday.  Talked with the owner, Carole, and very interesting background.  Loved the kale salad that she suggested.  Definitely a repeat place.

7a4l17zhXiLsTM8Xli7Nag.text: Awesome owner, awesome food, great atmosphere, amazing aura, just a very cool place to grab a quick bite to eat or sit and relax in the funky orange chairs.  The "pocket" sandwiches as I like to call it are amazing. I've been here a couple times before and they have these sandwiches dialed in! Brownies/treats are made at home (by the owner) and are very tasty, must try!!  Cheers!

8e0FZGjS823Z81YHD4sBOw.text: This place is great.  I love the story behind the place and the sandwiches are very unique.

zSrYs2yglZsCAmmvoFbSDA.text: Delicious, fresh food with friendly service.  Had the No. 10 with kale salad and pomegranate green tea.  Best lunch in town!

iylQWKckK0iiLIQVt6ZSzw.text: We love Zookz! My boyfriend and I tried Zookz for the first time this morning, and the owner introduced herself and made some suggestions for us to try- she was awesome!  We ordered two breakfast sandwiches and they were both AMAZING and just the right size to fill you up! We took some to-go menus with us, because we have a feeling this will be our new favorite spot! The service was exceptional, and the food was mouth watering, finger-lickin' good!

oOhluyi_eQryqjIZ071RFw.text: We visited today for the first time. We had two breakfast sandwiches - #22 & #66. We asked for our poached eggs to be soft. The owner explained why it might be difficult (because of the grill machine) but then accomplished it. I was expecting the #22 to have a nice smoky chipotle flavor but it was overpowered by the mustard (which wasn't mentioned in the description). When the owner came by to see how we liked our sandwiches, I mentioned this. She promptly made me another without the mustard and at no additional charge. That's the way service should be! Thin, crispy bread is exactly what I want in a sandwich and they do it perfectly. We will definately be back. And this will be my new take out spot for workday lunch.

Y4NhJ4kcbYem6nwIIXbjcA.text: Zookz is a fantastic untraditional sandwich and salad restaurant in uptown Phoenix.  I have had several of their breakfast & lunch sandwiches and salads from here before and I just keep on coming back for more. This place rocks! The inside is extremely well kept and visually appealing. The staff members are all friendly and are prompt to help you with any questions you may have about the menu. These guys work pretty quickly too in order to get you your food in a timely manner. The menu itself is pretty extensive too. Sometimes I would prefer shops like this to specialize in one type of product but their business model works (and taste) great! So much so that they close pretty early around 3 o'clock on the daily. I have loved all the menu items I have tried here.  If you find yourself in uptown for lunch you have to give Zookz a try!

D1TJOp7bKAUjVbCtJ072Gw.text: Awesome.  It's different, it's (can be) healthy, it's clean, it's delicious, it's, quick, and it's a great price.  Good spot for sure.

gTjwzjYnxzqBsJymr0cFXQ.text: I am not a big fan of this sandwich. Maybe it's because I compared it with other stores and I like others more than this one. However, I like their kale salad.

QXHUHPXXR29O4VqD7FZ4BA.text: Yelp brought us here. Very cute and trendy little place. Great service and reasonable prices. But we were disappointed given all the very positive Yelp reviews. The food just isn't anything special. Decent but not great.  I have to believe the Yelp ratings are based on service and price rather than flavor. All these things are important but food should be king. My wife ordered a #10 (by mistake she really wanted to try the #15; our fault ) and I had a #20. For the ingredients in my sandwich it should have had a lot more flavor. Turkey is shredded so more like a turkey salad. I saw the avocado and the bacon but no discernible flavors from them. Off day? Not fresh? The toasted bread itself was just really dry and the crust extra hard. My wife's was dry too and felt the apples were to overpowering. Maybe too many? Any way there are a lot of great places to eat in this area so I see no compelling reason to come back. Feel like Yelp failed me this time.

Ibp16D_NH_GeaHmgGdXIwQ.text: So good! The sandwiches are delicious! The portion size is normal sized for a an average person. I got full off of a lunch sandwich and side of potato salad. Definitely will be back again.

0IJzV-ltK6lLkR55pKLIig.text: My husband's been wanting to try this place so we decided to check it out on one of our trips into Phoenix.  Very friendly staff, simple menu, very delicious food.  I can't really explain what the sandwiches are like.  You just have to try it out.  It's like a closed in sandwich but when you bite into it, there's just a burst of delicious goodness.  Although I wasn't "full" after our sandwich (they're not very big but I would say probably the size of a sandwich that we SHOULD be eating) I was very satisfied.  Next time we're in the area I'd definitely go back.  Their green iced tea was yummy too!

N-Vu2fr3TjFnG99vbM_kAA.text: Love this place. Food is consistently good. #22 is my fav.  Love the variety of flavored teas they serve. The vibe is low key and family friendly. The owner almost always comes out and says hi to us and other guests. My folks have been going here for years and my only regret is I didn't start coming her until recently!

WOd625YUyCUbXke58iaKoA.text: Great little sandwich!!! Make sure to read the whole story on the wall about how zookz came to be! Just with that makes you want to order mother one for grandma!

sd5yjd53Ur3mLqa4T1w94g.text: The sandwiches have great flavor and there are a number of different side choices.  The staff is very friendly and there is plenty of seating.  It's also very clean and it's a great location.  There are also both breakfast and lunch sandwiches.  Only tip I have is that if you are very hungry you'll probably lean hungry after as the sandwich size is relatively small.  Great place for a light lunch if you anticipate a larger meal after.

4kAK_7hLLZDsi_-vpWYlKQ.text: I love Zookz! I always have! I don't know how some of these yelpers can write 1 star when they're angry they caught you outside business hours. It forever changes your rating and she HASN'T EVEN TRIED THE PRODUCT!?! Look at the hours, people! and don't get all hurt because you can't do your homework by looking at the hours!

GYZxsmqMWrLOkRiQk8uU2w.text: this place totally reminds me of when my mom bought me that lil sandwich press that made them into triangle pouch type of things in the early 90's. YES pls.... I live the pot pie looking shape.  staff super friendly and helpful and I watched him straight up perie back to the register which was tight after giving a sandwich to a customer. talent!  I got the special which was chorizo in a cream sauce, poached egg, avocado, jack cheese. sauteed onions. the chorizo sauce was super yummy but it had very lil (ie pix) and a big juevo.  the kale salad was a lil sweet for me but I really like the orange dressing thing going on there & it came free w/my special.   but it was alright and novelty but something the kiddos would like.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. the special was so yummy but I don&#39;t know where the chorizo is

MOx7slrNseL15OgNbBLRnA.text: Friendly employees, fast service, amazing refreshing kale salad, and one of a kind sandwiches.  To top it all off, it's local.  Cannot wait to try all their sandwiches. I met the owner as well who was just amazing.  I highly recommend this place!

hCqUzbb5CQPQRrmMOA8lBw.text: Original concept....sandwich (hot pocket) was decent, potato salad was good, and place was clean and nicely decorated.  But if you're hungry or in the mood for a great sandwich, skip this place and try your neighborhood deli instead

4Vwd8wicT7zu_hDD6fJH0A.text: Amazing sandwiches!  Perfectly toasty, melty and delicious. We had the breakfast sandwiches,  which were some of the best we've ever had! So good we took 2 "to go". If you've got a sweet tooth try the dessert sandwiches ... they too are something special!

fJ9i7YiDqoWEoQLZMubobg.text: It's a glorified hot pocket. It tasted good but the portion size was disappointing. It's a perfect snack not a meal.

112MYlE0YbTllmnLoLPH6Q.text: I'm a regular here for lunch on the weekends.  I've tried just about every sandwich on the menu, and I've loved them all.  Definitely made with love.  They come with a little side salad of your choice, which are also really good.  Not huge portions if that's what you're looking for, but perfect, in my opinion, and decently priced.  The front patio area is nice too.  Highly recommended.

0Em-MnNLVSHHFF4Xuc3-_w.text: I try to eat healthy but really can't. When you taste the salad and any sandwich your mouth will water like never before  Amazing Service

C097U7SPyA_REVT8kU4OyQ.text: We got sandwich #25 and it was probably the best sandwich I've ever tasted. The bread, the meat, the cheese... Everything was just perfect! You get a side salad with the sandwich so it's totally worth it. I also ordered a green tea pomegranate which was super refreshing.   The service was exceptional. They offered my dog a treat while we were eating out at the patio. The owner, carol, also came out to survey for our opinion. She is a very neat lady and I'm so glad that we found this place.

yPWwHii6-Bd1QCPSOuz1CA.text: Great concept!  Great Environment!  Prompt with the food!  And frankly cheap!!  Not to mention my sandwich was excellent!!  I had the #66

2KN7--axTmprcU9_Uepl1w.text: Number 22 is my favorite, I've been going here since it first opened up years ago and I go at least 3-5 times a month. They always have great customer service and delicious sandwiches. Keep it up guys!

NxU0bMqdlK1NOahkS_WL5g.text: Stopped in today for a late lunch. Outstanding. Friendly service. Excellent sandwich and the kale salad was amazing as recommended.    I got the ham and brie with apricot spread and almonds. Very tasty. The machine presses the sandwiches, reminds me of what we called hobo sandwiches around the campfire. I do taste the smokiness. Haha.  Be warned though, the sandwiches are small. Thats okay though, go with a friend and split a third sandwich. Perfect.     :-)

6-4ntMReIU8boBCSAZv_oQ.text: This sandwich shop is amazing. The staff was very nice and the food was extremely good! I recommend getting the Num 35, roast beef, and getting the kale salad for the side.  The owner, who I believe was on the line cooking, made it around to ask how our sandwiches were which I felt made her very open to hear what her customers thought.  Their dessert is also amazing! My wife and I shared a Banana, Nutella and Peanut Butter sandwich. This was a great way to finish the meal.

G9Fks6sMhZl_KJvoewRULQ.text: Zooks is delicious. They are soo friendly here and love to help you out with suggestions. I definitely recommend trying any of their top sellers (#25 is what i got).   The sandwiches are not huge, so if you are big eater...get a salad or another sandwich.   One wish I have for for Zooks is that the egg yoke would be runny instead.. That would be AWESOME!

IxY0iDXM9RsIPDOX0rROPQ.text: So today was the 4th time eating here in about a week, (I live like 25 min away)  still shocked how amazing the food is! Good job ladies!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. My usual #44
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. If you like lemon, you will love this cake!

cf_00Hbfvr2uHnPH-4TdQA.text: No. 5 salad was the best one I've ever had! The service was so good! Also they make their own dressing which is so cool. It was a refreshing place to spend a hot day! The door is super amazing also. Thank you Zooks staff for treating our 30 person group kindly.

Fm4BSOpUzpcdwWA_gHGXUA.text: What a great place!  Clean and modern, very hip, but absolutely not missing the warmth and love of a locally-owned business!  Carol, the owner, was walking around making sure everyone was happy, offering tastes to a party that was having a hard time choosing.  The sandwich was great, but I particularly liked the side salad selection (I had the potato salad, VERY yummy).  I love sandwiches, but get tired of chips...Zooks has four side salads to choose from, each looked better than the next, which comes with your sandwich instead of chips.  The windows were open, the weather was gorgeous, and this was a great intro to Phoenix for me.

aCKu-tJ8jErjg5Q1L_1pfA.text: Sandwiches are delicious and unique. Fun experience, staff was very friendly and helpful. Really enjoyed corn salad and kale salad. Food tastes fresh and the hot sandwiches arrived to our table quickly! We had lunch but would love to return for breakfast!

5_yuiFfRc3wAUbqCVWfcDg.text: I was excited to finally try Zooks. It was everything I had hoped for and more. Great service, food and environment. They even gave me a free kale salad to try since it was my first time in. I would highly recommend.

5aZOfyG7oqbsGsobM61njQ.text: We really loved this place. The owner stopped by to talk to us on our first visit. She explained how they worked hard to build their signature sandwich makers and that they work with wildflower bakery for their bread to be made in the shape they need for their sandwiches. I would try any of the sandwiches on the menu - excellent breakfast selections. I had the #25 which was the ham, avocado, black bean, cheese and signature chipotle sauce. DELICIOUS. Plus if you check in with Yelp you get 10% off your order. I can't wait to go back. I highly recommend this place. They have been open for 19 months. Right on the light rail in central phoenix.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. So good!
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Delicious!
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. This is exactly what we ordered it was awesome

pb4ynbuprskfrCoYfvsHWg.text: This place is amazing. I have tried almost every Breakfast sandwich on their menu. It's all a homerun. So inventive and original. Quality product and great price.

bbcXphUBLUYvc25PnD24vg.text: Zookz sandwiches is hands down the best sandwiches in all of Arizona, it's my little hide away spot and trust me you can't go wrong with any of the choices. The service is immensely wonderful and the owner? She's just a sweet heart, you can tell she loves what she does and what she puts on the plate, I only hope she has the ability to open a zookz near ASU because it'll be hit. I never write reviews but this place is amazing.

pUSeHE-rMf2TeKFYqEDwNA.text: I've been to Zookz 3 or 4 times and haven't had a sandwich I didn't like. I plan on working my way through the menu and Carole and the rest of the staff are outstanding.  Zooks is close to work so it is easy to pick up a quick breakfast or lunch sandwich and get back in our 30 minute time frame.    I don't eat my green veggies like I should (or at all) but I can survive on the Kale Salad.  It is to die for.   I would recommend Zookz to anyone.  It is located on Central across from St. Francis RC Church.    Try the Nutella, peanut butter banana sandwich as a dessert.   My friend and I share it as it is too sweet and filling to eat after a full sandwich.  Prices are great too.

ZmkstdS6I-c89AaPZqlGhg.text: I came here with my mother who was visiting from another state and we both absolutely loved our sandwiches. The salads we got with them were just as amazing. The portions were just right too. Not so much food that we wasted anything but enough that we definitely left feeling full. We'll definitely be coming back here.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

BIbSKR2_x-lEGMpUDG0zdQ.text: Popped in for a sandwich while in AZ for business. The owner Carol greeted me with the warmest welcome in the desert.  She's truly a sweetheart. The sandwiches are empanada-like and mine was DELICIOUS. I got the #10. Some turkey concoction that would order again and again.    Thanks for the yummmy lunch Carol

Q3FKwDz-mL87Wn8FcKMRGA.text: GAD-ZOOKS I can't say enough about Zooks! We make the drive from Gilbert just to eat here. The staff is very nice and helpful.  The atmosphere is super welcoming and comfortable.  The food? Well the food is fresh and super delicious. The sandwiches are on a fantastic bread panini style. SOOOO GOOD! You also get a side salad or chips (I've never gotten the chips). It's a choice of a freaking delicious garbanzo bean salad, mouth watering Kale salad, or Potato salad that will knock your socks off!  If you are looking for a new place to eat I highly recommend ZOOKS!

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. DELICIOUS #25, out of this worldpotato salad and prickly pear iced tea!

N09y7J68GH9slRx8mp2Dyg.text: I'm digging the new location because the original location had limited parking. I woke up one morning and was starving so I had my hubby stop at zookz for breakfast. We split #11- poached eggs, bacon, cream cheese, tomato and basil and a sweet one #55: peanut butter, Nutella, almonds, and bananas. #11 was good for the savory part of my meal, but #55 was freaken awesome for the sweet part!!  I definitely recommend trying one of the sweet ones because for as long as I've known zookz (a few years now), I've never had the sweet sandwich till recently and I feel like I've been missing out!!

i9Rjw61d3lnehUKaOiF5HQ.text: We were looking for a light breakfast this morning and this place had great reviews. The set up looks friendly and welcoming. We were greeted right away and we're told of a breakfast special of $10 for a sandwich and mimosa. The mimosa was a smaller portion but it had great fresh orange juice and the owner opened a fresh bottle of champagne. I ordered the No. 66 and Danny ordered the No. 22. All the sandwiches to be honest looked yummy! The sandwich itself was crunchy but not over cooked. The poached egg was great! I would recommend coming to this place, not crowded, great service, great food.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States

mbzTZdM9yEmmbQy5RcKYpQ.text: The morning was still. A late night of golf, cigars, and Super Smash Bros has worn out our lowly bachelor-partying crew, and we were desperate to find a breakfast place to energize us on our long trip home to the promised land of Tucson.   But lo! We discovered Zookz. The owner herself greeted us as we wandered inside, took our order and hand-delivered our sandwiches. The sandwiches were absolutely delicious, no additional fluff needed. My only complaint is that there isn't a Zookz in every room of my house.   This young fellow will be heard home with a grin and full stomach. Many thanks to you, Zookz.

MHoIyLPJuDJqLctTP1A1kw.text: This is probably my favorite sandwich shop in Phoenix. I remember ordering a sandwich when it first opened and the owner herself took my order, prepared it, and brought it to my table. Without a doubt I was hooked ever since. The incredibly delectable, toasted, ufo shaped sandwiches are worth every cent! If you come to this place to eat be sure to try a #20 with one of their fresh brewed teas to drink. Don't forget to grab either chips or a side salad that comes with every lunch sandwich. And if you're feeling like treating yourself, make sure to order a #55 for dessert! Can't wait to eat here again.

rMO2zVyNqK3y8-VIAb8EEA.text: Sandwiches are great.  My husband and I purchased three and shared because we could not decide on what to buy. So many delicious choices.   We really enjoyed the salads, bean salad and kale salad.  The owner is so friendly and welcoming. She explained all the offerings. Thanks for the great food.

LCmxyDsQvVCpH23mgVegMg.text: This is our first time at Zookz but won't be our last.  We had a couple of delicious sandwiches and sides. Met the owner Carole and she made us feel very welcome.  Looking forward to coming back.

uaLHBY8xhCVPzzXlkSLunA.text: I loved this place. The sandwiches are so delicious. I wasn't sure about the poached eggs inside a sandwich or cream cheese but its surprising how well they do together

A8EIoANDbqZkEJvCMDWP9g.text: Yum! One of a kind place.  Such nice people,  great vegetarian options. Somehow, the tomato and mozzarella with basil was Really juicy yet the outside was crisp. Can't wait to go again.

t0v1lLxCBhs2wYJz8i2-tg.text: Wow love the garbanzo salad! Great Price Great smiles! Love the edges of that are Crisp!

LASZPwEi0PuBDwVs6o1oGA.text: Delish!!! Unique and the service is top notch!! I love the owner--I brought 5 kids in and she made sandwiches to their liking.

RydAWKdfUQJEMgeo29CJ7Q.text: So good great spot for lunch even breakfast. Stayed cool in the hot heat when they had it opened. Super relaxed feel. Better then Starbucks to do homework and get a drink/bite

A_-3TnUOVSX4AaRP6u7Mvw.text: Use to make these sandwiches with a press back in the day. Generous with the filling, side salads are good, nice chill spot to eat at. Been here many times.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. This is the No. 35. Has roast beef and horseradish sauce. Yum! The garbanzo side is good also.

08b6EFcvevm2vaGvRPjAAQ.text: I love Zooks, especially this new location.  Not much to say that others haven't-- these awesome little disc sandwiches are just delicious.  The side kale salad that comes with it is excellent.  I appreciate the consistency and quality of food, and the gals working the register are always quite friendly.

_VKGgwZ3gOXoUuPaxLYaxQ.text: 3/4/17 I ordered a #22 - 2 1/2 stars  I ordered a #3 - 4 Stars  FINALLY - a good salad, the vinaigrette was delicious.  I will definitely be back for this salad.  I do have a question about the pricing...it's my fault that I didn't ask for a receipt.  $19.88 seems a bit pricey especially when I had 10% off with my Yelp check in.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. FINALLY - a good salad!!  #3
Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. #22

JavFqU54IxlBSJ3F7IwljA.text: New fave little cafe! This place is so cute, very bright, and the ambience emanates! Staff was very friendly, I had difficulty finding it, called, and they were incredibly helpful. They gave me order suggestions, but I had an idea of what I wanted. I got a passion fruit mimosa that they fresh squeeze the juices, and was DELICIOUS! I also got a turkey, cranberry, pineapple, carrot, almond and curry sandwich, served almost on a panini type sandwich. DELISH! Will absolutely be back and can't wait to try the whole menu! They also have delicious looking breakfast items, and a plethora of coffee options.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Passion fruit mimosa and cranberry, turkey, pineapple, almond, carrot and curry sandwich!

bxRXyFfHFftCBgbbwgrE2A.text: I recently came across this new place a few months ago. My dad was in town and we wanted to grab brunch. As I yelped up something to eat, we figured to give this place a try. My dad was in love with the sandwiches and even last weekend he brought up how good the breakfast sandwich was at "that one place that starts with a Z". I got the No. 33; poached eggs, feta and parmesan cheese, fresh spinach, tomatoes, and fresh basil mmmmm Can't go wrong with some fresh basil. My dad got the No. 44 and apparently it was to die for, obviously since he's still talking about it. We met the owner who was super nice and down to earth. Explained that they were in a different neighborhood and recently moved to this new location. It's in the "new and up and coming" neighborhood of the uptown plaza; Located next to Chipotle and Flower Child off of Camelback.   The atmosphere is small, quiet. I love that all the windows open so it's like you're sitting outside. I think they even have mimosas now which is new. I've never had their lunch sandwiches, but i'll definitely give them a try.

8b9lGVUcMtDdIp6wT3VzjA.text: Been in Arizona 5 days and this is the first enjoyable meal we have had.   Basically a gourmet uncrustable. Delicious, fresh and worth a visit.   Staff was friendly and helpful. Trendy atmosphere and very clean.  The dessert was amazing too. We will certainly return.

photos.caption: Photo of Zookz Sandwiches - Phoenix, AZ, United States
